data.comment: The match has started, with Porto kicking-off.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
Porto to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 5, Nacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Porto.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In Porto, Diogo Leite (Porto) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Porto.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Porto.
In the minute 11, Throw-in high up the field for Porto in Porto.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Nacional.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Throw-in Nacional.
In the minute 19, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards Nacional a goal kick.
Porto have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 20, Pedrao (Nacional) has received a yellow card from Manuel Oliveira.
Goal! Sergio Oliveira gives Porto the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Nacional throw-in in Porto's half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 28, Nacional needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Nacional defence as Otavio fires in a strike for Porto.
Porto have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Porto's Mehdi Taremi breaks free at Estadio do Dragao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, In Porto Nacional's Joao Camacho is caught offside.
Manuel Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 35, Nacional drives forward and Kenji Gorre gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Porto.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Porto.
In the minute 37, Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Porto.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Goal! Moussa Marega extends Porto's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Mehdi Taremi.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 42, Porto's Sergio Oliveira is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Porto.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 44, Porto have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Manuel Oliveira.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
In the minute 45, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio do Dragao the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a Porto throw-in in Nacional's half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has commenced. Nacional with the kick-off.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Porto have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Porto are pushing forward but Sergio Oliveira's finish is wide of the goal.
Manuel Oliveira awards Nacional a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Nacional.
Throw-in for Porto at Estadio do Dragao.
Corner awarded to Porto.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Porto.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Chico Ramos is replacing Vladan Danilovic for the away team.
In the minute 55, Can Nacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Porto's half?
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Moussa Marega for Porto is whistled offside.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Manuel Oliveira signals a Porto throw-in in Nacional's half.
In Porto Porto attack through Nanu. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
In the minute 63, Larry Azouni for Nacional has been booked by Manuel Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Joao Victor is replacing Kenji Gorre for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
Throw-in Nacional.
Otavio for Porto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
The home team replace Otavio with Luis Diaz.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Porto.
In the minute 72, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 74, Manuel Oliveira signals a throw-in for Nacional, close to Porto's area.
Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 76, Porto's Mehdi Taremi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Sergio Conceicao (Porto) is making a second substitution, with Toni Martinez replacing Mehdi Taremi.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Jesus Corona with Marko Grujic. This is the third substitution made today by Sergio Conceicao.
Porto to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio do Dragao.
Nacional make their third substitution with Ruben Micael replacing Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan.
In the minute 80, Luis Freire is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Dragao with Bryan Rochez replacing Joao Camacho.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 82, Nacional's Bryan Rochez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Dragao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Porto have a goal kick.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Fabio Vieira is on a sub for Moussa Marega for Porto.
The home team replace Sergio Oliveira with Joao Mario.
Manuel Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Porto.
In the minute 88, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Manuel Oliveira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Porto's Toni Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Manuel Oliveira awards Nacional a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Nacional.
The match has come to a close in Porto. The final score is 2-0.
